title: Interpretation of buying jewelry in a dream

preview.html: Dreaming of buying jewelry in a dream for a single girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced man, she either wears gold jewelry or buys diamond jewelry from a jewelry store. A ring earring with a chain by Ibn Sirin, Nabulsi, Imam al-Sadiq, and others. Interpretation of a dream about buying jewelry in a dream is one of the very beautiful and wonderful dreams that we see in a dream, and the dreamer experiences a lot of happiness and joy because of the acquisition of a precious metal in life, such as gold. One of the most beautiful things that we want to have in life is to save money and other things, and women use it for adornment and to obtain beautiful jewelry. Buying gold in a dream has many important signs and associations. Imam Al-Sadiq explained to us in his writings the vision of buying jewelry in a dream with many important meanings and connotations. Which we must be aware of and pay attention to. Interpretation of buying jewelry in a dream Buying jewelry in a dream proves that you will be very successful in serious matters, especially those related to the heart. If an unmarried woman buys a gold chain in a dream, this indicates the marriage of the younger sister in reality. If you see a girl buying a necklace in a dream, it means that she will get married this year. Buying gold in a dream is a sign of the coming goodness of a person. Seeing a married woman buying jewelry in a dream and storing it is evidence that she will help her eldest son in his marriage. Seeing a married woman buying a gold watch in The dream is evidence that her daughter will get married. For a married woman to see that she has lost gold in a dream, this is evidence that she will lose a member of her family. Seeing a man buying a gold pen in a dream means that he will obtain a high status in his life. A man who watches jewelry in a dream is evidence However, he will reach a high and recognized position in his work. Buying gold in a dream: Seeing a pregnant woman in a dream buying a golden ring decorated with lobes of precious stones is evidence that is very easy and without any obstacles. Buying a car made of pure gold in a dream is evidence that an unmarried young man will marry soon. Seeing a young man buying a gold car in a dream means that his wife will become pregnant soon. Seeing a young man buying a car made of gold is a sign of abundance of wealth. Buying a box of gold is a sign of the abundance of goodness that will come to him. Seeing a girl who has gold coins is evidence that she will meet The ruler of the country. Seeing a man writing with a golden pen in a dream is evidence that he will receive the blessings of this world. If one sees himself buying a golden key in a dream, this is evidence that God will remove worldly obstacles before him. Buying a box of gold in a dream is evidence of buying an expensive house. To dream of a young man buying a house of gold is evidence that he has begun to earn as a result of his exhaustion in life. A young man wearing a gold ring in a dream indicates a close marriage with a girl he loves. Seeing a jewelry box - YouTube

title: Interpretation of seeing a horse in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing a horse in a dream: The horse or steed is one of the mammalian creatures used for riding or drafting. It has been relied upon in recent years for transportation and war, and it is one of the noble animals on which many topics are based. With this in mind, here it is reviewed next.. Seeing a horse in a dream There are many interpretations about the dreamer seeing a horse in a dream, and it is one of the good dreams that portends good things and a huge source of livelihood that he will receive. In the event that the dreamer sees in his dream that He rides a horse, this indicates how wise he is and can manage his affairs and make decisions wisely. When a girl sees a beautiful-looking horse in her dream, this promises her to hear good news after a long waiting period. If the dreamer sees a horse in his dream, this indicates his ability to defeat enemies and control them. If one sees a horse with a strong body in his dream, it means that he will improve his financial situation and collect money. Seeing a bad-looking horse means that the dreamer is following his whims and desires and must repent to God. Seeing a horse in a dream by Ibn Sirin The great scholar Ibn Sirin says that seeing the dreamer riding a horse in His dream indicates a high status and honor that he will soon acquire. If a fortuneteller sees a horse encircling him in a dream, this indicates that he is in a financial crisis, but God will provide him with a solution and someone will help him get rid of it. If a girl sees a little pony in her dream, this foretells her a bright future full of events. Good, and all her dreams will come true. But if the sleeper sees a horse, it looks very tired in a dream, then these are unpleasant visions that indicate great sadness due to the death of one of his relatives. Seeing horses in a single woman’s dreamIf an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is riding a horse, then that He promises her a soon marriage to a wealthy young man and she will enjoy comfort and a happy life with him. If the dreamer sees buying a horse in his dream, this will indicate many good things and abundant food that will come to him. If the dreamer is unemployed and sees horses in her dream, this symbolizes her obtaining A prestigious job and opening the doors of happiness for her. When a girl sees in a dream owning a horse, this is a sign of status, pride, and a happier and luckier life. As for riding a horse in a fortune teller’s dream, it is a sign of ensuring complete protection for her in her life without fatigue. Interpretation scholars believe that seeing a girl in Her dreams of an unclean horse lead to poverty and sadness in the coming days. What is the interpretation of seeing a horse in a dream for a single woman? Seeing horses in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates special and happy events coming her way and she will be very happy about them. Also, if a girl sees horses in her dream, And if it was in good condition, it means that she will be engaged soon and there will be many positive changes. The dreamer seeing that someone is offering her an elegant horse, foretells that she will obtain a prominent position and occupy the highest positions. If a girl sees an elegant horse riding in her dream, this means great success. Achieving goals and aspirations and achieving

title: The 50 most important interpretations of seeing a gold chain in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: What you do not know about the interpretation of seeing a gold chain in a dream. The interpretation of seeing a gold chain in a dream. What is the interpretation of a heavy and long gold chain in a dream? What does it mean to see yourself wearing a gold chain with God's name written on it? What did the interpreters say when they saw the gold chain given to someone in a dream? To know the secrets and mysteries of this dream, follow the article below.Do you have a dream that confuses you? what are you waiting for; Google is an Egyptian website for interpreting dreams. A gold chain in a dream. The interpretation of a dream about a gold chain is interpreted as good news and the fulfillment of desires if the chain is beautiful and light and does not cause sadness to the dreamer because it was not heavy on his neck. If the dreamer dreams that he is wearing a small and narrow gold chain and it causes him pain and discomfort, then the dream indicates It has many not-so-good meanings, which are as follows: Whether or not: Many responsibilities that he was unable to fulfill and perhaps the series of debts that made the dreamer’s life miserable and full of worries and sorrow. Second: It is possible that the dreamer made a promise to someone and did not fulfill it, and this The dream reminds him of fulfilling this promise, and a man wearing gold in a dream is a bad sign in most cases, specifically if he is wearing it with the intention of adornment like a woman, then this indicates sins and wavering of his faith and certainty in the power of God. A white gold chain, if seen in a dream, may indicate Its meaning is good luck, a lot of legal money, the disappearance of sorrows and obstacles, and the dreamer's path will be smooth and free of evil, until he is able to. Achieving his ambitions without suffering. A gold chain in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin said: The chain or pendant that the dreamer wears in his sleep may be a trust that he asks about and he must keep it until he returns it to its owners. When a person wears a gold necklace with pieces of iron, he has a strong personality. He is known among people for his courage and not being afraid of anything. God will make them enter Hell until they see the most severe torment for this. Ibn Sirin explained that the necklace made of gold and studded with rubies indicates the priest’s steadfastness and his great ability to successfully overcome difficulties. What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a gold chain in a dream? Interpretation of a dream about a gold chain in A dream about a girl: If she is a school or university student wearing a heavy gold chain in the dream, this indicates the heavy burden that she bears in her life because she is suffering from the difficulty of her academic stage, but if she asks God to help her overcome this stage. He will not take it and give it to her to succeed and get rid of this responsibility safely and securely. A girl finds her father giving her a lot of expensive gold jewelry such as necklaces, rings and bracelets while she is sleeping and when she wears them she becomes beautiful and attractive. The dream means that she lives in happiness and prosperity, and her father may leave her a large inheritance after his death. When a girl in a dream finds a beautiful gold chain in the school or university where she studies, the dream here symbolizes her academic excellence. title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing the jinn according to scholars

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a jinn in a dream, seeing a jinn is one of the visions that causes a feeling of extreme panic in the fortuneteller, which makes him rush to search for different interpretations and connotations of seeing good or evil. About magic and envy, we will tell you the consequences of thinking in this article. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a jinn Imam Al-Nabulsi says that seeing a jinn in a dream is a symbol of treacherous owners who enter the dreamer's house. As for the vision in the form of a person you know, it is a warning to that person’s fortune teller. Seeing a jinn in the form of a young child is one of the visions that expresses the many problems of life and the burden of worries. The vision also expresses the many temptations and the dreamer must be careful and cling to getting closer to God Almighty. If the dreamer sees that he teaches the jinn the Holy Qur’an and they memorize behind him, it is a happy vision that indicates the strength of faith, the strength of the dreamer and his control over all matters. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a jinn by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that dreaming of jeans in a dream is a vision that expresses a personality that has many talents and abilities that enable it to achieve success quickly, but it does not benefit from these talents. The vision also expresses the presence of enemies near the dreamer and they carry feelings of hatred and hatred towards him. If the jinn is Muslim, it is a symbol of grace, kindness and the woman’s imminent transition to a married man. Seeing jeans expresses many trips and journeys to search for sciences and gain a lot of knowledge in life. As for the vision in the house, it is a symbol of thieves who want to steal from you and you must beware of them. Interpretation of a dream about jeans that a single woman sees Some jurists believe that jeans in a woman’s dream The unmarried woman is evidence of psychological fears that the girl feels as a result of loneliness, isolation and severe anxiety about the future. The dream of an unmarried woman wearing jeans is a vision that alerts her to the need to read the Holy Qur’an and the appetite with legal ruqyah to get rid of the evil spirits surrounding her. If an unmarried girl sees the presence of a genie in her life and rejects him or removes him from her life, this vision is one of the bad dreams that indicates the presence of a young man in her life with bad morals. If an unmarried woman sees that she is reading the Holy Qur’an in the jinn, this vision shows the strength of the girl’s personality and her continuous effort to get closer to God Almighty. Interpretation of a dream of seeing married jeans The genie in a married woman’s dream, Ibn Sirin interpreted it as falling into a major problem or crisis, but he will be able to solve it soon. Imam Al-Nabulsi says that seeing the genie and feeling extreme fear and terror from him is a vision related to many bad things related to their health or serious financial problems. A married woman seeing herself wearing jeans is a vision that indicates many problems and disputes between her and her husband, as it is a metaphor for financial crises and instability in married life. Interpretation of a dream of seeing jeans for a pregnant woman Seeing jeans in dreams for a pregnant woman is a metaphor for the bad thoughts that haunt her Often during this period, it is a vision that is mainly caused by fear and extreme anxiety and

title: Interpretation of white hair in a dream for different occasions

preview.html: Interpretation of white hair in a dream for different occasions. Learn about the interpretation of white hair in a dream from Ibn Sirin. White hair usually begins to appear in people during the advanced stages of life. With each strand of white hair, you can realize the extent of what this person has gone through. Experiences and experiments in his life shaped his personality and contributed to the balance of his mind and thinking. White hair sometimes indicates many worries and adversities that have turned youth and strength into sexual weakness and gray hair. Among women who hate bleaching their hair for fear of feeling helpless and old, and among young people who dye their hair white in an attempt to keep up with the latest fashion trends and feel respected and appreciated as older people. The symbol of white hair in a dream by Ibn SirinIbn Sirin explained that the meaning of seeing white hair in a dream varies depending on The dreamer’s social status and age. If a person sees his hair turning grey, this indicates his distress and poverty of money, and the more white hair he has in his dream, the greater his poverty and the distress of circumstances in this world. And whoever sees in his dream that he has bleached and grayed all over his head, then this A bad sign that something big, misfortune and misfortune will happen in his life and solutions to his problems or the death of someone. He is close to him, as white hair indicates advancing age and reaching the most anxious age, and God Almighty knows best. And whoever sees in his dream that he is trying to pluck some white hair from his head in a dream, this indicates the occurrence of great hardships and calamities in his religion or that he will be exposed to financial poverty. Or imprisonment for removal. Of poetry. Plucking is against the Sunnah. When a person sees that white hair has begun to appear on his beard, this is a sign that his condition has changed from joy to sadness and from stability to confusion and confusion, so it is a sign of anxiety and distress, by God. God knows best. Better. On the other hand, the dream of students or scholars in a circle with white hair is a sign of good religion and morals, and a sign of reverence and respect among men. Also, seeing elderly people with white hair in their dreams means longevity, and God knows best. And whoever sees hair in his dream White and gone for a while, he will soon return to safety, God willing. Seeing white hair in a married woman’s dreamThe importance of seeing an unmarried woman with white hair in her dream varies depending on the extent of her situation with her husband and the stability of her married life. If she sees white hair in her dream and her husband is an honest, just, and good man This is good news in married life that will continue until they grow up, God willing. It also indicates the blessing and abundant food that they will enjoy soon. Seeing white hair on the head of a married woman indicates that she helped her husband succeed in her work and professional life, which made him a well-known successful man. His wife is proud of him among the people. While her circumstances with her husband are in a state of turmoil, he treats her badly, which makes her suspect that he is cheating on her, and this vision is evidence of her husband’s betrayal and her betrayal of her, and God is Most High and He knows best. She must take care of him. A married woman who sees...

title: What is the interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s dream of a dead person taking gold from a living person?

preview.html: What is the interpretation of a dead person’s dream of taking gold from a living person? Interpretation of a dead person’s dream of taking gold from a living person in a dream: It symbolizes bad meanings in most cases. To learn more about the connotations of this dream, here is the following article, which will be full of interpretations by Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, and senior scholars. Do you have a dream that confuses you? Do you expect that? Google is an Egyptian website for interpreting dreams. Interpretation of a dream about the dead taking gold from the living. Seeing a dead person taking gold from the dreamer symbolizes different meanings, which are as follows: Or not: If the deceased insisted on taking a gold necklace from the woman in the dream and taking it off her neck against her will and she moved away after taking it and the dreamer left screaming On the loss of this necklace, the dream warns her. That one of her daughters is in serious trouble and may die soon, because the deceased took money, gold, or clothes from the dreamer against his will is evidence of the serious losses he is suffering, and these losses may be either death, theft, or creation. Failed and unprofitable projects. Second: If the deceased takes from the dreamer an old piece of gold jewelry and gives her another new piece, then the problems and troubles of her life that she suffered from in the past will disappear, God willing, and God will give her a new life that will make her happy, whether that life is a new romantic relationship or a new job. And so on. Interpretation of a dream about a dead person taking gold from a living person according to Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin said that this vision indicates losses of all kinds, and according to the type of the dreamer’s profession and what he feeds on, we will know the full meaning of the dream. Away from the hands of others and unfortunately he will lose everything, and he will return again to the first step with which he started his life. But there are some special symbols in this vision that explain the benefits and they are as follows: Or not: The dead took from the living the broken or twisted gold and gave them a piece of sound And new gold. Second: If the dreamer sees a deceased person taking a piece of gold from him and giving him an expensive piece of diamond in its place, then the vision indicates that the dreamer will lose something and God will give him great compensation. Interpretation of a dead person’s dream of taking gold from a living person in SoloIf an unmarried woman sees a dead man taking a ring If she gets engaged, she will lose her relationship with her fiancé and the engagement will be canceled soon. In some important interpretations of senior jurists, it was said that this vision warns the dreamer that upcoming life events will be difficult and someone from her family will often die. And if an unmarried woman dreams of a golden ring and wants to wear it, but she fails Either because it was too tight or it fell out of her hand to the point that she felt insulted and she saw in the same dream a dead man taking this ring from her and giving her another beautiful and suitable shape, and she immediately wore it and was happy with it, summary of the interpretation. Her sadness and pain, and since she left her life, a new man will come to her, better than the last one, and she will begin her love life with him. Interpretation of a dream of a dead person taking gold from the living for a married woman: When the deceased takes the gold that the married woman was wearing, her husband dies or she loses a lot of money in exchange for her work. If the dreamer is a mother She has two daughters

title: Interpretation of seeing long hair in a dream and short hair in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of a dream about hair for a single, married, pregnant or divorced girl, whether it is straight, curly, black, blonde, red, or gray. I dreamed that my hair became long, cut, and falling out more. Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, and Imam Al-Sadiq. Interpretation of the symbol of hair in a dream. Seeing long hair is a good thing, especially in the eyes of a woman, as it It symbolizes a long life, abundance of money and a lot. Seeing short hair indicates sadness and suffering, God forbid. We must know that this interpretation is for someone who sees his hair long or short in a different way than it actually is. Scientists and dream interpreters say that seeing hair in a dream is unusually long, in In reality, it symbolizes advancing age, increasing money or knowledge. Or gaining position, prestige, influence, or profit from trade. A woman who sees her hair getting longer in a dream may indicate birth, in a married woman’s dream, or the death of her father if she is unmarried. Seeing hair Short hair is not good, unlike seeing long hair, as this vision conveys fatigue and sadness. Seeing short hair in a dream that is not in the nature of the dreamer symbolizes worry and anxiety, a disaster or an unhappy event. Seeing a person in a dream as if plucking his hair portends a calamity or hearing sad news or Evil in the waySeeing a man as if he had shaved his hair in a dream means victory over enemies, pride, strength, and prestige. Interpretation of seeing hair in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Imam Ibn Sirin, may God have mercy on him, mentioned that seeing hair in general in a dream indicates many different themes and meanings. Likewise, it is possible that Seeing hair in a dream indicates the life that the dreamer lives in reality and his life, whether that life is long or short. As for the good condition and smoothness of the hair in the dream, it indicates an increase in the glory, honor, and status that the dreamer acquires in real life. Whoever sees in his dream that his hair It has become smooth, then this dream indicates an increase and increase in money and wealth possessed by one of those responsible for insight in reality, whether he is the manager at work or the governor and the president. As for curly hair in the dream, it is a sign of honor and glory that the dreamer lives with in real life. If this curly hair is long and scattered in groups, the vision indicates the dispersion and distribution of the employee’s or leader’s funds. As for seeing a bump in a dream, which is a term used to express long hair that falls on the shoulders, seeing it in a dream, whether straight or curly, also indicates more than one meaning, depending On the position in who he already is. Dreamer: If the monarch is righteous, then his vision of the bridle indicates an increase in honor and prestige among the people. But if the fortuneteller is the owner of money and wealth in his waking life, then his vision of long hair, which is unique to the shoulders and is called the bridle, then his vision shows the money and wealth that he already possesses. And the poor man Whoever sees in his dream his long hair extending over his shoulders, this vision indicates the many sins and disobedience that will come to him in his wake. Interpretations of a dream about hair

Interpretations of a dream about hair

title: I dreamed that I was cheating on a single women's exam

preview.html: Unlike the student who tries to cheat and deceive, our Master the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, mentioned it in an honorable hadith about the punishment for cheating, and through your website gptafser.com/ we will be able to interpret the vision, so follow us. Interpretation of seeing that I am cheating in an exam in a dream about a single girl. The girl who sees herself cheating Exams in a dream are a sign that she feels afraid of the exam that has to be taken. Because he really did not do what he was supposed to do and study properly. When a girl sees cheating in an exam, it is an indication of an important stage such as marriage or work and you cannot skip it if He was not really in education and finished school. The inability to find the correct answer to solve the exam for one girl. A sign that she is unable to achieve something in her life that she wants and dreams of. And when she sees herself unable to solve the exams, this is evidence of her need for attention. If a girl sees that she is cheating despite the difficulty of the examination, it is a sign that she overcame the difficulties of her life by cheating, and God knows best. In the event that she cheats on the examination, it could be a warning against committing sins, and he must stop, approach God, and repent. God is Most High and Most Knowing. Not being accepted for the exams in which she cheated; Because it indicates that her marriage is not complete. When he is accused of cheating on an exam, this is a sign that he will actually be held accountable for something. If she sees herself in a dream preparing to cheat, this is a sign of the imaginary job she is preparing for, and God knows best. And if she sees that her lover is one of the He cheats on her in exams, so be very careful because he may be deceitful. See also: Interpretation of failing an exam in a dream and its meaningInterpretation of seeing that I cheat in an exam in a dream about a married womanIf a married woman sees herself cheating in an exam, then this dream is a sign that she has wrong behavior. The examination in the dream, when it is repeated to her often, shows that she is an oppressed woman, and faces many difficulties. Resolving the examination in her dream is nothing but a sign of her overcoming the difficult situation in her dream. If she sees her son in a dream and teaches him not to rely on cheating in examinations. This indicates that he Indeed, it is an upbringing of good character. Perhaps the vision of cheating is a sign of her rights other than hers, and she needs to wake up, because injustice is darkness on the Day of Resurrection. Seeing her husband cheating on an exam is a sign of her husband cheating, and lying to her is his advice and repentance for him. And if she sees herself accusing her husband of cheating, this is an indication of Marital disputes that will arise between them. When you see that he is changing the examination paper, this is a sign that he is taking other people's money. Seeing cheating in the examination of a married woman could be a sign that she does not have good morals worthy of praise. And God knows best. If he clears the exams by cheating, but fails, this indicates that he is going through a difficult period full of problems. Likewise, if he succeeds after cheating in the exams, it symbolizes the use of tricks to overcome crises. And God knows best. If the vision of temptation and deception is repeated, then he must turn to God and hasten to repent and refrain from the sins he commits. Interpretation of a dream about cheating

title: Interpretation of numbers in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of numbers in a dream, according to the opinion of many interpreters, symbolizes many good things, God willing. Zero indicates the arrival of a new baby. For more details about the interpretation of numbers in a dream, follow us in the encyclopedia. Interpretation of numbers in a dream. Some commentators suggested that the number 1 indicates victory over those who oppose it. The number 2 indicates the multiplication of livelihoods. The number 3 indicates the cessation of Livelihood. As for the number 4 in a dream, it shows very good, abundant, and blessings. The number 5 indicates the expected happiness, God willing. While the number 6 indicates the end of worries and anxiety. As for the number 7, it indicates the best diet, money, or child. As for the number 8, it indicates To marry a born woman, God willing. The number 9 indicates success and achieving goals. The number 10 shows wisdom and intelligence. Seeing a dream about numbers in a single woman’s dream. Seeing the number 1 in a person’s dream indicates noble values ​​and high morals. As for the number 2, it indicates the nearness of marriage, God willing. Or visiting relatives. As for the number 3 for single people, it indicates the abundance of goodness and ample living. While the number 4 in a dream indicates peace and security. The number 5 can refer to the period preceding marriage or engagement. As for the number 6, it can also indicate the end of anxiety. And sadness and the end of sadness. The number 7 indicates the date of approaching engagement. The number 8 indicates a good marriage, God willing. The number 9 indicates that you will achieve what you want in this world and the hereafter, God willing. The number 10 for single people indicates marriage to a relative. Seeing numbers in a dream is for a woman The number 0 in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates that she will give birth soon, God willing. The number 1 indicates that this child, God willing, is a righteous and victorious son. The number 2 indicates that she can give birth to twins, God willing. As for the number 3, it may indicate the difficulty of childbirth, and God knows best. The number 4 for a pregnant woman indicates a good and happy birth, God willing. The number 5 can indicate the remaining period of labor in the weeks or months that have passed since pregnancy. The number 6 indicates a good birth, God willing, and the removal of pregnancy problems. The number 7 in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates... There are problems between her and her husband, and he indicated that she will give birth to a male child. The number 9 also indicates the approaching date of birth, because it symbolizes the months of pregnancy. As for the number 10, it indicates that she will give birth to a knowing boy, God willing. To interpret a new dream, you can use the dream interpretation application Immediate. This was our discussion about seeing numbers. Follow us on Encyclopedia to get all the news as long as you are safe.

title: Interpretation of seeing a basin in a dream

preview.html: In our article, we talk about seeing a washing machine in a dream or dream through the vision website Roy2a.com by Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, Ibn Kathir, and Imam Al-Sadiq, as the washing machine is considered one of the most important things in our house, as we use it to clean clothes from any stains. We will discuss the interpretation of this vision through this topic for a girl. A single woman, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a man, and a young man. What is the interpretation of seeing a sink in a dream by Ibn Shaheen: Seeing a sink in a dream by Ibn Shaheen is an indication of the ability of the visionary to solve all his problems and the principle of stability in his life. Seeing a sink in a dream is an indication of his request for sincere repentance from God Almighty and then from him with corruption. Seeing a washbasin in a dream indicates that the dreamer is characterized by moral corruption and his complete distance from the path of God and His wrath upon Him. See also the interpretation of seeing a set of clothes in a dream. What is the interpretation of Ibn Sirin who sees a washbasin in a dream: Seeing a washbasin in a dream according to Ibn Sirin is an indication of the dreamer’s effort to make him happy. His family and keeping them away from problems. Seeing a basin in a dream indicates the stability of marital life and people’s love for the scenes. Seeing a basin in a dream indicates his great success and his ability to achieve his life’s dream. Seeing a basin in a dream indicates that he held a great position among the people, their respect for him, and the strength of his personality. See also the interpretation of washing clothes in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a wash basin in a dream for a man: Seeing a man washing clothes in a dream is an indication of imminent death from worries, sorrows and relief. Seeing a man washing clothes in a dream is an indication of people’s love for him and his love for doing good and helping them solve all their problems. Seeing a man washing clothes in a dream is an indication of people’s love for him and his love for doing good and helping them solve all their problems. At the sink and washing his clothes in a dream indicates that his wife will enjoy a pregnancy that will make her life happy. See also the interpretation of seeing a rope in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a married woman washing clothes in a dream: Seeing a married woman washing her clothes in a dream indicates her great search for the stability of her life and the happiness of her husband and children. Seeing a married woman washing Clothes in a dream are a sign of feeling loved and secure with her husband. Seeing a married woman washing someone’s clothes in a dream is an indication that she has access to a lot of money and that they are bringing her a lot of sustenance. See also: Interpretation of seeing intercourse in a dream. Interpretation of seeing water in a basin in a dream: Seeing water in a basin in a dream is a sign. On the dreamer’s superiority and great success in his life. Seeing water in a basin in a dream indicates his ability to solve all his problems and remove his worries and sorrows. Seeing water in a basin in a dream states that it brings goodness and blessings to one’s life. See also: Interpretation of the appearance of menstrual blood in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a copper basin in a dream. Dream: Seeing a copper wash basin in a dream indicates that it brings goodness and nourishment to the dreamer’s life. Seeing a copper wash basin in a dream indicates that the dreamer feels happiness, stability, and love with his family. What is the interpretation of seeing someone I know washing clothes in a dream: I see in a dream that I am washing clothes A person I know is an indication of the dreamer’s good morals, his distance from corruption, and his closeness to God Almighty. Seeing clothes washed in a dream
